levels.description: Prioritizing ground Operators, gives <@ba.vup>1</> ally 3 fireballs with the following effect: Every <@ba.vup>{cooldown}</>s, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Reed the Flame Shadow's ATK as Arts damage to an enemy, triggering her Trait but only on that ally.
